# zane-sidenav

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Overview

侧边导航栏组件，提供页面侧边导航功能

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description        | Type      | Default |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `showLoader` | `show-loader` | 是否显示加载指示器 | `boolean` | `false` |
